translation.en: Mm, those acorns look so yummy!
translation.ja: あのドングリ おいしそう

translation.en: [shrieks] Acorns! Acorns!
translation.ja: ドングリが いっぱい

translation.en: ♪ YooHoo to the rescue ♪
translation.ja: ユーフーしゅつどう！

translation.en: ♪ We're on a mission, let's explore ♪
translation.ja: さあみんな あつまって

translation.en: ♪ Let's have some fun and so much more ♪
translation.ja: ぼうけんへ ひとっとび

translation.en: ♪ Travel the world and meet new friends ♪
translation.ja: ともだちとであう

translation.en: -♪ Our journey never ends ♪ -♪ Let's go! ♪
translation.ja: たびはおわらない

translation.en: ♪ YooHoo to the rescue ♪ ♪ YooHoo to the rescue ♪
translation.ja: ユーフーしゅつどう！ 　　ユーフーしゅつどう！

translation.en: ♪ Pammee, Lemmee, Roodee, and Chewoo ♪
translation.ja: ペミー レミー ルディ チュウ

translation.en: ♪ And our captain ♪
translation.ja: そしてキャプテン

translation.en: ♪ YooHoo! ♪
translation.ja: ユーフー！

translation.en: ♪ YooHoo to the rescue ♪ ♪ YooHoo to the rescue ♪
translation.ja: ユーフーしゅつどう！ 　　　　みんなともだち

translation.en: [YooHoo] "Pika's Pine Cone Collection."
translation.ja: ナキウサギと まつぼっくり

translation.en: What's all that, Chewoo?
translation.ja: それ なに？

translation.en: Hey, is that a bag full of acorns?
translation.ja: ドングリをつめた ふくろ？

translation.en: Yes. Yes, it is! It's all acorns!
translation.ja: そうなの ぜんぶ ドングリよ

translation.en: You're not going to eat all of them, are you?
translation.ja: １人で たべきれないでしょ？

translation.en: No. I'm going to take them home. Maybe eat a few.
translation.ja: いえに もってくの ２～３こ たべるかも

translation.en: Anyway, there are still a lot more acorns under the big tree. Can you help me?
translation.ja: 木の下に まだあるから 手つだって

translation.en: With what?
translation.ja: なにを？

translation.en: With the other acorns under the tree. Duh, I should really go pick them up.
translation.ja: もちろん もっと ドングリをひろうの

translation.en: But you have so many already.
translation.ja: そんなに あるよ？

translation.en: Yeah, but, but, um... They will be wasted there.
translation.ja: そうだけど もったいないでしょ

translation.en: Oh, everyone, look!
translation.ja: みんな あれを見て

translation.en: Chewoo, those acorns will have to wait. We've got a mission!
translation.ja: ドングリは あとでね おしごとだ

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.ja: いくわよ

translation.en: Destination confirmed.
translation.ja: いき先 かくにん

translation.en: It seems that a pika living in China is in trouble!
translation.ja: ナキウサギが こまってる

translation.en: China, here we come. YooHoo to the rescue!
translation.ja: ちゅうごくだ ユーフーしゅつどう！

translation.en: -Let's go! -Let's go!
translation.ja: しゅっぱつ！

translation.en: Hi! You're YooHoo and the crew, right? Welcome to China.
translation.ja: こんにちは　ユーフーたちね

translation.en: My name is Tokee.
translation.ja: トキーよ

translation.en: -Hello, Tokee. -Hello, Tokee.
translation.ja: やあ トキー

translation.en: What are those in your basket? They're so pretty!
translation.ja: それ なに？ すごくかわいい

translation.en: They are, aren't they? I collect pine cones.
translation.ja: でしょ？ これは まつぼっくりよ

translation.en: But, Tokee, you called us for help, right? Well, how can we help you?
translation.ja: トキー どうして ぼくたちをよんだの？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Of course. Well, I guess we should go to my home first.
translation.ja: まず わたしのいえに いきましょ

translation.en: Is this your home, Tokee?
translation.ja: ここが きみのいえ？

translation.en: Yes, this is it.
translation.ja: そうなの

translation.en: Since I'm the only pika living in this forest, no one has ever really come to my house. So, welcome!
translation.ja: 森に なかまが いないから おきゃくさんは大かんげい

translation.en: Thanks! Your home looks small, but really cute.
translation.ja: ありがとう 小さくてステキないえね

translation.en: Actually, that's why I called you. It's so crowded here, so I need to move to a bigger place.
translation.ja: せますぎるから 大きないえに うつりたいの

translation.en: But I have too much stuff. I can't carry everything on my own.
translation.ja: でも１人じゃ にもつをはこべない

translation.en: I see. Well, we're here to help.
translation.ja: わかった　手つだうよ

translation.en: Oh, please be careful and don't step on the cones. Thanks!
translation.ja: まつぼっくりを ふまないでね

translation.en: Watch your step. It's pretty packed in here.
translation.ja: 足もとに気をつけて

translation.en: [Pammee] Whoa!
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: So many!
translation.ja: 山づみに なってる

translation.en: What is all this, Tokee?
translation.ja: こんなに どうしたの？

translation.en: I got these pine cones myself!
translation.ja: あつめたの

translation.en: Uh, all of these?
translation.ja: １人で こんなに？

translation.en: Yeah! Nobody in this forest has this many pine cones!
translation.ja: 森のだれより たくさん もってる

translation.en: Why did you bring all these other pine cones, then? You already have so many.
translation.ja: なのに まつぼっくりを また ひろったの？

translation.en: But they're all different. If you look closely, the cones are different colors and shapes.
translation.ja: よく見ると １つ１つ いろや かたちが ちがう

translation.en: Uh-oh! Watch out!
translation.ja: あっ　気をつけて

translation.en: [all] No!
translation.ja: あぶない！

translation.en: Watch out!
translation.ja: たいへんだ

translation.en: Tokee, are you okay?
translation.ja: トキー ケガは？

translation.en: Is everyone okay?
translation.ja: みんなは？

translation.en: [all] Yes.
translation.ja: へいき

translation.en: Sorry, guys. But I barely touched the pine cones.
translation.ja: ごめん すこしあたった だけなのに

translation.en: I know.
translation.ja: わかってる

translation.en: It's just that there were way too many pine cones on the pile.
translation.ja: たくさん つみ上がってたからだよ

translation.en: Pine cones are fine. And some are really pretty.
translation.ja: まつぼっくりの せいじゃないわ

translation.en: You just need a bigger place for them, Tokee.
translation.ja: ひっこせばいいのよ

translation.en: Exactly. That's why I called you guys here.
translation.ja: そう　だから みんなをよんだの

translation.en: I need to move to a bigger house.
translation.ja: 大きないえに うつるわ

translation.en: All right, then. We'll help you, Tokee.
translation.ja: みんなで手つだうよ

translation.en: You can count on us!
translation.ja: まかせて

translation.en: Phew! I almost forgot to bring this one.
translation.ja: わすれるとこだった

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.ja: たいへん

translation.en: We have more pine cones now.
translation.ja: また ふえちゃった

translation.en: It's because Tokee picked up even more pine cones on the way here.
translation.ja: トキーが とちゅうで ひろうからだ

translation.en: This new place is not going to cut it.
translation.ja: ここでも せまいかも

translation.en: Really? Should I move to a new bigger place? Again?
translation.ja: もっと大きないえに うつる？

translation.en: No matter where you go, Tokee,
translation.ja: キリがないよ

translation.en: your house will feel small if you keep collecting pine cones.
translation.ja: まつぼっくりが どんどん ふえてる

translation.en: Hmm. Then...
translation.ja: じゃあ…

translation.en: What if we throw some away? Just a thought.
translation.ja: すこし すてたら どう？

translation.en: [both] No way!
translation.ja: ダメ！

translation.en: Tokee, do you really need all these pine cones?
translation.ja: どうしても ぜんぶ いるの？

translation.en: Well, I don't exactly, absolutely, totally need them.
translation.ja: ぜんぶ いるわけじゃないけど

translation.en: Okay. So, what do you want to do with them?
translation.ja: このまつぼっくりで なにをするの？

translation.en: Well, I don't really do anything with them.
translation.ja: べつに なにもしないよ

translation.en: And I happen to know that pine cones are not edible.
translation.ja: これは たべられないよね？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, but...
translation.ja: うん　そうだけど…

translation.en: [Chewoo] Stop, you guys.
translation.ja: みんな やめて

translation.en: Tokee just likes collecting them. She likes to stare at them.
translation.ja: トキーは これをあつめて ながめるのよ

translation.en: And she likes to play with them.
translation.ja: これで あそべるしね

translation.en: Play with them?
translation.ja: あそべるの？

translation.en: Yeah, play with them, you know? You don't?
translation.ja: そう　もしかして しらなかった？

translation.en: How would you play with pine cones?
translation.ja: いったい どうやって？

translation.en: I would play with them with friends.
translation.ja: ともだちと あそぶ

translation.en: Friends?
translation.ja: ともだち？

translation.en: Over here. There should be another pika living at the end of this road.
translation.ja: べつのナキウサギが この先に すんでる

translation.en: His name is Wing.
translation.ja: なまえはウィング

translation.en: I hope he's around.
translation.ja: あえるといいね

translation.en: I bet it would be much more fun to share pine cones with friends.
translation.ja: ともだちに まつぼっくりをあげよう

translation.en: [all] Hello!
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: Hi! Uh, what's going on? Who are you?
translation.ja: はじめまして きみたち だれ？

translation.en: I'm YooHoo and this is my crew.
translation.ja: ぼくはユーフー

translation.en: Our pika friend just moved close to here.
translation.ja: トキーっていう ともだちが―

translation.en: Her name is Tokee and she lives at the end of that road.
translation.ja: ちかくに ひっこしてきたんだ

translation.en: -Tokee? -Yes.
translation.ja: トキー？ その子が いえに あそびにきてほしいって

translation.en: She's very nice. And she would love to invite you to her new house.
translation.ja: その子が いえに あそびにきてほしいって

translation.en: Would you like to join us for dinner?
translation.ja: しょくじをしましょ

translation.en: I've never had a friend come over to my house.
translation.ja: ともだちが きてくれる

translation.en: I hope he likes me.
translation.ja: なかよく したい

translation.en: Of course, Wing will. As long as you're kind to him, I guess.
translation.ja: やさしくすれば なかよしに なれるよ

translation.en: Kind?
translation.ja: やさしく？

translation.en: Uh... How do I do that?
translation.ja: どうすればいい？

translation.en: Um, you greet him, ask him to sit, offer him something to eat?
translation.ja: あたたかく むかえて しょくじを出すの

translation.en: But where will Wing sit? There's really no space.
translation.ja: でもウィングが すわるばしょがない

translation.en: And nothing to eat.
translation.ja: たべものは？

translation.en: In that case... Should we throw some pine cones away?
translation.ja: まつぼっくりを すこし すてようかな

translation.en: [both] Really?
translation.ja: ほんと？

translation.en: Really? Can you do that, Tokee?
translation.ja: そんなことが できるの？

translation.en: That's how you show you're a kind friend, right?
translation.ja: やさしく しなきゃ

translation.en: That sounds exactly like something a kind friend would do.
translation.ja: あたらしい ともだちのために―

translation.en: Make room for a new friend!
translation.ja: ばしょをあけましょ

translation.en: Hi!
translation.ja: ようこそ

translation.en: Oh-oh. It's so cool in here.
translation.ja: きれいな いえだね

translation.en: Really? Thanks for saying that.
translation.ja: そう？　ありがとう

translation.en: Did you set all these pine cones up? This is really awesome.
translation.ja: まつぼっくりを かざったの？　すごい

translation.en: Thanks!
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: I've never seen one that...
translation.ja: はじめて見たよ

translation.en: Thanks for inviting me over, Tokee.
translation.ja: きょうは ありがとう

translation.en: It was fun, Wing.
translation.ja: たのしかった

translation.en: That was really fun!
translation.ja: すごくね

translation.en: So, can I visit you again some time?
translation.ja: また あそびに きていい？

translation.en: Of course, you can.
translation.ja: もちろんよ

translation.en: Hey, here. This is for you.
translation.ja: これ あなたにあげる

translation.en: But you said this one is really special to you.
translation.ja: とくべつな まつぼっくりだよね？

translation.en: I used to think only pine cones were special back when I didn't have any friends.
translation.ja: うん　でも ともだちが できたから―

translation.en: But now, I don't think that.
translation.ja: もう いいの

translation.en: They're still special to me, but not as special as you are.
translation.ja: ともだちのほうが たいせつだもん

translation.en: Thanks, Tokee. To new friends!
translation.ja: ありがとう ともだちのトキー

translation.en: Tokee's house looks really clean.
translation.ja: いえが きれいになった

translation.en: Yeah, she won't have to move again.
translation.ja: ずっと あそこに すめる

translation.en: That's true.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: So, now... What would my dear friend Chewoo do with all her acorns?
translation.ja: それじゃ チュウは あのドングリをどうする？

translation.en: I, well... I'm not going to bring all the acorns home.
translation.ja: ぜんぶ いえに もってくのは やめる

translation.en: That's a great idea, Chewoo.
translation.ja: 大さんせいだよ

translation.en: Speaking of home, let's go there, crew.
translation.ja: じゃ いえにかえろう

translation.en: [crew] Yeah, let's go home!
translation.ja: そうだね　かえろう

translation.en: [all] YooHoo's Journal!
translation.ja: ユーフー･ジャーナル

translation.en: We met two pikas today.
translation.ja: ナキウサギは―

translation.en: They are also known as crying rabbits because of the sound they make.
translation.ja: なくような音を出すから そう よばれる

translation.en: [YooHoo] These animals have small ears and short tails,
translation.ja: 耳も しっぽも みじかいよ

translation.en: and store food in caves or between rocks.
translation.ja: すあなにエサをかくす

translation.en: Now, the cute pikas are our friends, too!
translation.ja: ナキウサギは ともだち！
